summary: REQ-25 appears implemented: the footer now includes a visible website link with text "www.vinodelectricals.com" and an href of exactly "https://www.vinodelectricals.com". The Admin link remains present as "#/admin". Two additional files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) were modified though not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added repository documentation or metadata summaries unrelated to the requested footer link change (frontend-file-summaries.txt).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to update the footer website link; it does not request updating summary/manifest files.
BuildRequest does not request any change to project tracking/state files; only the footer link behavior/text is in scope.
